@greptileai Doesn't getThreadsByResourceIdPaginated for most of these stores not support those new ordering parameters? Those will need to be implemented once we finish migrating, hence the todo.

```suggestion
      ? [...this.#originalModel]
```
We will be making a breaking change.
this is not needed as it should only happen when a user triggers an action => client side only
useLayoutEffect might be better in this case, to try avoiding the visual shift

When finishing up this PR, please add your changes also to the v1 migration guide (current link: https://github.com/mastra-ai/mastra/blob/main/docs/src/content/en/guides/migrations/upgrade-to-v1.mdx, might change. Search for "upgrade-to-v1.mdx" then).
